original_title: The For King & Country Live Concert Film
overview: This one-hour concert special will give fans an exclusive perspective of for King & Country’s last arena show before the COVID-19 pandemic, giving a close-up view of the incredible live show that the duo has become known for. From intimate backstage moments to passionate singalongs with the sold-out audience, this is the most complete chance to see for King & Country’s fully produced live spectacle.
title: The For King & Country Live Concert Film
